title: Did the Girl Scouts give "the highest prize" to a girl for her pro-choice activity?
subtitle: Healthy and life-friendly websites were widely referenced from one interview in November 2018, which did not mention abortion.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In late 2018 or early 2019, Girl Scouts in the United States presented Tucson, Arizona, a member of the "Gold Award" for a project promoting abortion.
